options.name: Beginner Necromancer
options.description: You can research Beginner Level Necromancy Spells and gain +1 Power.

options.name: Reaction : Death Pact
options.description: When you drop to 0 Health, instead drop to 1 Health and immediately gain one Action

options.name: Novice Necromancer
options.description: You can research Novice Level Necromancy Spells, gain +1 Spell Attack and +2 Power.

options.name: Action [Daily] : Death Touch
options.description: You make a Touch Spell Attack against a Creature, dealing Dark Damage equal to [Level]d6.

options.name: Essence Theft
options.description: When you bring a Creature to 0 Health, you gain Health and Power equal to half of their Level.

options.name: Journeyman Necromancer
options.description: You can research Journeyman Level Necromancy Spells, gain +5 Power and +2 Dark Mitigation

options.name: Free Action : Undead Service
options.description: When you take a Creature down to 0 Health as a result of one of your Spells, the Creature comes under your command, taking its turn after yours ends. At the end of its turn, this effect ends. This Spell does not affect Elementals or Constructs.

options.name: Repurposed Horrors
options.description: Your Spells that raise Beasts or Humanoids as Thralls also work on Monsters and Undead.

options.name: Expert Necromancer
options.description: You can research Expert Level Necromancy Spells, gain +8 Power, +1 Spell Attack and +1 Spell Damage

options.name: Lich
options.description: You no longer require Sleeping, Drinking or Breathing. You do not require Food and it does not benefit you when you eat it. Additionally, you become Immune to Disease, Exhaustion, Poison and become Immune to effects that make you Sleep.

options.name: Undead Conduit
options.description: You can Channel Spells using a Thrall under your control as the point of origin. If the Spell requires Focus, it uses your Thralls Focus instead of yours.

options.name: Master Necromancer
options.description: You can research Master Level Necromancy Spells, gain +10 Power, +1 Spell Attack and +1 Resistance. Additionally, you can research or learn Grand Master Necromancy Spells at level 13.
